name.ja: <ruby>野<rt>や</rt></ruby><ruby>性<rt>せい</rt></ruby>なるバリア －ノラーフォース－

requirement.en: When an opponent's monster declares an attack.

effect.en: The attacking monster loses 200 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if you have 3 face-up Beast, Beast-Warrior, and/or Warrior Type monsters with 200 DEF on your field, you can destroy all Attack Position monsters on your opponent's field.

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Double Star of the Assault!!
